title: 杜蕾斯聊天插件的变量
author: z234696818
txt_content:
这款帮派插件的玩家聊天栏显示变量是什么
http://www.shijiexia.com/gangbanghuichaa.html

replies.author: BlackMax
replies.txt_content:
z234696818 发表于 2020-2-6 13:54
那请问这个插件呢？
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=806123
%gangsplus_in_gang% 组队的 
%gangsplus_gang% 队伍 
%gangsplus_gang_tag% 队伍标签 
%gangsplus_gang_rank% 队伍排名 
%gangsplus_gang_homes%队伍基地 
%gangsplus_gang_friendlyfire% 友伤 
%gangsplus_gang_online% 在线 
%gangsplus_gang_size% 规模 
%gangsplus_gang_leader% ** 
%gangsplus_gang_level% 等级 

%gangsplus_gang_wins% 胜利次数 
%gangsplus_gang_losses% 失败次数 
%gangsplus_gang_wlr% 胜利失败比 
%gangsplus_gang_kills% 击杀数 
%gangsplus_gang_deaths% 死亡数 
%gangsplus_gang_kdr% 击杀死亡比

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
没有注册变量
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... ertype=2&page=1

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
没有变量

[管理][帮派]Gang帮派插件 —— 一个很强势的肛（公会）插件 [1.7.10-1.10.2]
